name: preact-cli-plugin-async
description: Preact CLI plugin that adds optimized support for async/await via Kneden.

scripts.test:build: ln -fs ../node_modules test && preact build --cwd test && bundlesize -f 'test/build/bundle.*.js' -s 4.5kB
scripts.test: eslint async-plugin.js && npm run -s build && npm run -s test:build
scripts.release: npm run -s prepare && npm test && git commit -am $npm_package_version && git tag $npm_package_version && git push && git push --tags && npm publish

author: Jason Miller <jason@developit.ca> (http://jasonformat.com)
